title: Using Express with Node
description: In this video, I look at how to add express.js to your node application to serve static files.

timestamps.title: Introduction and discussing web servers for hosting files
Setting up npm and installing Express.js
Using Express.js to set up our server and host it on our system on a specified port
Hosting our p5.js sketch files on the local server
A summary and an overview of the next steps before we go!

links.title: Local Server, Text Editor, JavaScript Console
links.description: Tutorial on developing p5.js sketches and running a Python local server to host them.
